descript.abstract: WMATA Metro Bus Lines. The dataset contains locations and attributes of metro bus lines, created as part of the DC Geographic Information System (DC GIS) for the D.C. Office of the Chief Technology Officer (OCTO) and participating D.C. government agencies. A shapefile provided by WMATA identified bus lines. A WMATA bus line represents a series of routes that comprise a complete public transportation bus line. Although the lines are captured and segmented at the internal WMATA line number (as opposed to the route number), the layer contains the most recent route delineation and attribution available. All DC GIS data is stored and exported in Maryland State Plane coordinates NAD 83 meters. METADATA CONTENT IS IN PROCESS OF VALIDATION AND SUBJECT TO CHANGE.
descript.purpose: This data is used for the planning and management of Washington, D.C. by local government agencies.

idinfo.useconst: For data terms and conditions, go toÂ http://dc.gov/page/terms-and-conditions-use-district-data

cntaddr.address: 7th Floor B Corridor, 600 Fifth Street, NW

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.2.2.1350

attracc.attraccr: Validated by source and/or responsible agency. WMATA internal data capture and business process attribution was removed from the original file. Only line name, type, direction, etc was kept.

dataqual.logic: Validated by source and/or responsible agency.
dataqual.complete: Validated by source and/or responsible agency.

horizpa.horizpar: Generally follows the street centerlines but was not captured to the DC GIS snapbase.

procstep.procdesc: WMATA provided updated bus lines in shapefile format which DC GIS staff merged the files into one layer.

cntorgp.cntorg: Office of the Chief Technology Officer

procstep.procdesc: WMATA digitized the bus lines using in-house, MAPINFO based viewer and digitization software that is part of their scheduling system. The linework was fitted to the NAVTEQ regional streets file. WMATA supplied the file in MAPINFO format to the District and the Office of Planning converted it to a shapefile.

cntaddr.address: 7th Floor B Corridor, 600 Fifth Street, NW

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Bus Line Name and Route Number(s)

distinfo.custom: Most DC GIS datasets can be downloaded from "http://dcgis.dc.gov" on the data center page. Orders can also be made by contacting OCTO GIS at "dcgis@dc.gov", especially for datasets not available for download.
